author: ggregory
msg: The prefix 'java.lang.' is not required to refer to this special package. This is the only package this rule applies to.

author: lhazlewood
msg: Fixed a few bugs related to remote proxy Session management (exceptions not properly propagating to the correct layer).  Added some performance enhancements in the DelegatingWebSecurityManager to cache the session on a thread-local instead of regularly accessing the back-end system avoiding network round-trips where possible.

author: ggregory
msg: Now that we are on Java 1.4, we can save the original exception when we re-throw another exception.

author: ggregory
msg: Refactor common logic between URLCodec and QuotedPrintableCodec. Code coverage 100%/100% for both classes.
